Name of Project: HPV
Health Systems Strengthening (HSS2)
Notes:
HSS 2 support has 3 main strategic objectives:
1. Ensure functioning of the supply chain to ensure vaccines are available on time at all levels; Cold chain optimisation
2. Establish effective leadership and management
3. Reduce the incidence of Vaccine Preventable Diseases through consistently good quality immunisation services; creating demand to reach coverage targets

Support is concentrated in 63 priority districts

MOMENTUM Safe Surgery in Family Planning and Obstetrics (MSSFPO)
MOMENTUM Routine Immunization (M-RITE)
Implementing Partner Name:
JSI, Prime Partner of Consortium; (other members include PATH,Accenture Development
Partnerships, Results for Development, Gobee Group, CORE
Group, andThe Manoff Group)
Notes:
DESCRIÇÃO DO PROGRAMA
USAID M-RITE fornece apoio ao Ministério da Saúde de Moçambique para reforçar o seu programa de imunização de rotina, identificando e removendo estrangulamentos persistentes e barreiras ao planeamento, entrega, procura e aceitação de serviços de imunização. As actividades incluem o trabalho com o Ministério da Saúde e ONGs locais para fornecer formação, supervisão de apoio e reforçar os comportamentos dos fornecedores para melhorar a qualidade da imunização de rotina e os cuidados de vacina COVID-19 a nível das unidades de saúde e da comunidade. A USAID M-RITE também fornecerá apoio para estabelecer melhores sistemas de planeamento, orçamentação e acompanhamento dos programas de imunização. O programa trabalhará também com organizações locais para desenvolver e implementar actividades de mudança social e comportamental destinadas a aumentar e sustentar a procura de imunizações.

RESULTADOS E IMPACTOS ESPERADOS

Estabelecer um sistema de informação que utilize eficazmente dados e análises para informar o planeamento, orçamentação e priorização de actividades relacionadas com imunizações.
Melhorar e sustentar actividades de mudança social e de comportamento para encorajar imunizações de rotina .
Aumentar e sustentar o acesso a cuidados de imunização de qualidade nas províncias alvo..

Name of Project: G2G Sofala
Notes:
the intervention focuses all non-ajuda sites, with specific focus to Chemba, Maringue and Muanza districts

---

The Sofala Provincial Health Services Institutional Strengthening Project has nine main objectives:

Improve patients' linkage to ART.

Increase the retention of patients on ART in the province.

Improve data quality for decision making at all levels.

Ensure the effectiveness of antiretroviral drugs in patients with comorbidities.

Ensure the correct prescription of optimized regimens to all patients on ART.

Improve the planning of HIV program activities.

Ensure the timely implementation of planned activities.

Improve the monitoring and evaluation of the implementation of the program activities.

Increase the TB case detection rate.

Name of Project: Manica OVC Local project (ANDA)
Implementing Partner Name: Associação Nacional para o Desenvolvimento Auto Sustentado (ANDA)
Notes:
USAID ChenguetaiVana works to reduce HIV prevalence and HIV-related mortality among children and adolescents byl identifying, linking and retaining vulnerable children, at-risk adolescents, and their families in care. Activities are designed to provide orphans and vulnerable children (OVC), adolescents and youth with strategies to stay healthy and develop life skills,support families to become more resilient, and engage and
mobilize communities to take action against harmful social norms and practices. It also works to improve coordination among health and social protection institutions and systems.The project is aligned with the Government of Mozambique’s strategic responses to the HIV epidemic and OVC crisis and will introduce innovative strategies and enhance collaboration with existing government structures to improve child protection and response readiness.
